overview:

CBAN aspires to be the first organised angel investors network in China.

CBAN members invest individually, at their discretion, when and where they choose. CBAN activities include monthly start-up presentation events; the start-ups are selected by CBANâ€™s Screening Committee from the pool of business plans that are being submitted to CBAN by the various entrepreneurs.

CBAN itself is a group, a community of angel investors and as such it is a not-for-profit organisation. CBAN is also affiliated and has an active collaboration with the Business Angel Network South-East Asia (BANSEA).
